projects.name: Business site
projects.discription: A business site is a website that provides information about a company, its products or services, and its contact details. It serves as an online presence for the business and helps potential customers learn more about what the company offers.

projects.name: Weather app
projects.discription: A weather app is a software application that provides users with current weather conditions, forecasts, and other meteorological information. It typically includes features such as temperature, humidity, wind speed, and radar maps.
